function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in outdoor noise levels due to travel restrictions during lockdown","Impact":"Potential decrease in awareness of environmental noise pollution","Mitigation":"Implement alternative noise monitoring strategies and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Noise monitoring devices, public awareness campaigns","People":"Urban residents, environmental activists","Owner":"Local government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Positive and natural sound sources becoming disturbing during reduced outdoor noise levels","Impact":"Negative impact on mental well-being and quality of life in urban areas","Mitigation":"Development of soundscaping design approaches and reliable sound maskers","Technologies":"Sound maskers, soundscaping design approaches","People":"Urban residents, urban planners, architects","Owner":"City planning authorities, architectural firms"},{"Description":"Increase in annoyance ratings of neighbor noise during lockdown","Impact":"Potential decrease in acoustic comfort at home for remote workers","Mitigation":"Reinforcement of sound insulation guidelines for building elements such as walls, floors, and ceilings","Technologies":"Advanced sound insulation materials, building design adjustments","People":"Remote workers, homeowners, building contractors","Owner":"Building regulation authorities, construction companies"}]}
